explanation: A Top, Fidget Spinner, Gyroscope, and the drum of a Washing Machine all operate fundamentally on the principle of spinning or rotation. A Pendulum operates by oscillation, swinging back and forth, rather than rotating.

category: Seven Wonders of the Ancient World
explanation: The Great Pyramid of Giza, Hanging Gardens of Babylon, Colossus of Rhodes, and Lighthouse of Alexandria are all traditionally recognized as four of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. The Colosseum, while an impressive ancient structure, is not included in this traditional list.
Four of the words are homophones of single-digit numbers (Won=One, To=Two, For=Four, Ate=Eight). 'Tree' does not share this characteristic.
